skillTree.localised_description: Bruckner’s mighty Demigryph, larger than the Knightly Order's standard stock, strikes fear and instils confidence as it dominates the battlefield at its master’s behest.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who bear the Mark of Hysh are practitioners of the magical Lore of Light, and the bane of Chaos, for they are able to control and manipulate the White Wind of Magic.
The relentless drive and fury of the Hammer, harnessed for the protection of this ward’s bearer.
Bruckner doesn't really need a sword because his body is a weapon in its own right.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Whether it's his hulking frame, or the many stories of his past deeds, but few can stand in this one's presence without feeling a little awestruck.
As Nuln's official headsman and Countess Emmanuelle's personal champion, Theodore Bruckner is known colloquially as the Hound of Judgement, such is his tenacity to see bloody justice done.
"Where he comes from, nobody knows…"

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +20% for this Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Bruckner's chosen mount both strikes fear and instils confidence, as the mighty Demigryph bounds across the battlefield at its master's behest.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +8% for Demigryph units
	(own army)

Attribute: Causes Terror for Demigryph units
	(own army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: The Countess' Hound of Judgement is her Judicial Champion when the ancient rite of trial-by-combat is invoked within the Imperial aristocracy.

enabled_if: Enemy Lord or Hero presence in ability range.

attributes.bullet_text: A unit with Executioner will execute units in combat below a 20% hit points threshold.
This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
"If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

items.colour_text: With a tip crafted from meteoric iron and engraved with the runes of the heavens, this lance strikes its target like a bolt of lightning, both burning and blasting the foe to ash.

item_set.name: Executioner's Tools
item_set.description: Equipment befitting of the Countess Emmanuelle's official headsman.

items.colour_text: Gifted to Bruckner by Elspeth von Draken, to protect him from the foul sorceries of the Maggot Lord, this black gem possesses powers unknown, and served Elspeth's own deadly schemes.

item_set.name: Executioner's Tools
item_set.description: Equipment befitting of the Countess Emmanuelle's official headsman.

items.colour_text: For centuries this long blade has been used by the city of Nuln's champion in preference to the more traditional headsman's axe.

item_set.name: Executioner's Tools
item_set.description: Equipment befitting of the Countess Emmanuelle's official headsman.

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Theodore Bruckner is the embodiment of bloody-handed judgment and a prolific taker of heads, should the law require such a manner of restitution for crimes committed against the state.
